##### FILE: kubernet_dashboad.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kubernetes-dashboard/Deployment/kubernetes-dashboard:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: kubernetes-dashboard
  name: kubernetes-dashboard
  namespace: kubernetes-dashboard
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: kubernetes-dashboard
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: kubernetes-dashboard
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --auto-generate-certificates
        - --namespace=kubernetes-dashboard
        image: kubernetesui/dashboard:v2.7.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8443
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 30
        name: kubernetes-dashboard
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 2001
          runAsUser: 1001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /certs
          name: kubernetes-dashboard-certs
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp-volume
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: kubernetes-dashboard
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
      volumes:
      - name: kubernetes-dashboard-certs
        secret:
          secretName: kubernetes-dashboard-certs
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-volume

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/comfyui:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: comfyui
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: comfyui
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: comfyui
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: 123456789012.dkr.ecr.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/comfyui-images:latest
        name: comfyui
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8848
        resources:
          limits:
            nvidia.com/gpu: 1
          requests:
            nvidia.com/gpu: 1
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/ComfyUI/models
          name: stable-diffusion-models
        - mountPath: /app/ComfyUI/output
          name: comfyui-outputs
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /comfyui-models
        name: stable-diffusion-models
      - name: comfyui-outputs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: comfyui-outputs-pvc

---

##### FILE: kubernetes_deployment11_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/wordpress-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: wordpress-mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
      tier: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wordpress
        tier: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        image: mysql:5.6
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/wordpress:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: wordpress
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
      tier: frontend
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wordpress
        tier: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_HOST
          value: wordpress-mysql
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        image: wordpress:4.8-apache
        name: wordpress
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: wordpress
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html
          name: wordpress-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: wordpress-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: wp-pv-claim

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to jlab/Deployment/jupyterlab:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: jupyterlab
  name: jupyterlab
  namespace: jlab
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: jupyterlab
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: jupyterlab
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        - |
          start.sh jupyter lab --LabApp.token='password' --LabApp.ip='0.0.0.0' --LabApp.allow_root=True
        image: jupyter/datascience-notebook:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: jupyterlab
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8888
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 500Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /home/jovyan
          name: jupyterlab-data
      restartPolicy: Always
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 0
        runAsUser: 0
      volumes:
      - name: jupyterlab-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: jupyterlab-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mattermost-operator/Deployment/mattermost-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mattermost-operator
  namespace: mattermost-operator
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: mattermost-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: mattermost-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --enable-leader-election
        - --metrics-addr=0.0.0.0:8383
        command:
        - /mattermost-operator
        env:
        - name: MAX_RECONCILING_INSTALLATIONS
          value: "20"
        - name: REQUEUE_ON_LIMIT_DELAY
          value: 20s
        - name: MAX_RECONCILE_CONCURRENCY
          value: "10"
        image: mattermost/mattermost-operator:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mattermost-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8383
          name: metrics
      serviceAccountName: mattermost-operator

---

##### FILE: kubernetes_deployment6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to minio/Deployment/minio:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: minio
  name: minio
  namespace: minio
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: minio
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: minio
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: disktype
                operator: In
                values:
                - hdd
      containers:
      - args:
        - server
        - /data
        - --console-address
        - :9001
        env:
        - name: MINIO_SERVER_URL
          value: https://minio.example.com
        - name: MINIO_BROWSER_REDIRECT_URL
          value: https://console.minio.example.com
        - name: MINIO_IDENTITY_OPENID_CONFIG_URL
          value: https://keycloak.example.com/auth/realms/home/.well-known/openid-configuration
        - name: MINIO_IDENTITY_OPENID_CLIENT_ID
          value: minio
        - name: MINIO_IDENTITY_OPENID_CLIENT_SECRET
          value: cad5f999-81e6-4791-afef-86ddd18ae3df
        - name: MINIO_ROOT_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MINIO_ROOT_USER
              name: minio
        - name: MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: minio
        image: minio/minio:RELEASE.2022-07-29T19-40-48Z
        name: minio
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: minio
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: s3-pv-storage
      volumes:
      - name: s3-pv-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: s3-pvc

---

##### FILE: kubernetes_deployment7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --dbpath
        - /data/db
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-creds
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-creds
        image: mongo
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongosh
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: mongo
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongosh
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-data-dir
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-data-dir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-data

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/github-runner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: github-runner
  name: github-runner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: github-runner
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: github-runner
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GITHUB_OWNER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: GITHUB_OWNER
              name: github-secret
        - name: GITHUB_REPOSITORY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: GITHUB_REPOSITORY
              name: github-secret
        - name: GITHUB_PERSONAL_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: GITHUB_PERSONAL_TOKEN
              name: github-secret
        - name: DOCKER_HOST
          value: tcp://localhost:2375
        image: github-runner:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: github-runner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /work/
          name: data
      - env:
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: ""
        image: docker:24.0.6-dind
        name: dind
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 512Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker
          name: docker-graph-storage
        - mountPath: /work/
          name: data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: docker-graph-storage
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ValidatingWebhookConfiguration/namespace.webhook.example.com:
apiVersion: admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1
kind: ValidatingWebhookConfiguration
metadata:
  name: namespace.webhook.example.com
  namespace: default
webhooks:
- admissionReviewVersions:
  - v1
  clientConfig:
    caBundle: 
    service:
      name: validating-webhooks
      namespace: webhooks
      path: /webhook
      port: 443
  failurePolicy: Ignore
  name: namespace.webhook.create.com
  rules:
  - apiGroups:
    - ""
    apiVersions:
    - v1
    operations:
    - CREATE
    resources:
    - namespaces
  sideEffects: None
- admissionReviewVersions:
  - v1
  clientConfig:
    caBundle: 
    service:
      name: validating-webhooks
      namespace: webhooks
      path: /delete
      port: 443
  failurePolicy: Ignore
  name: namespace.webhook.delete.com
  rules:
  - apiGroups:
    - ""
    apiVersions:
    - v1
    operations:
    - DELETE
    resources:
    - namespaces
  sideEffects: None

---

kind: Deployment

    matchLabels:
      app: validating-webhooks
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: validating-webhooks
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: namespace_update:v1
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: mutating-webhook
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        volumeMounts:

          name: webhook-certs
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: webhook-sa
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-certs
        secret:
          secretName: tls-secret

##### FILE: kubernetes11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/github-runner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: github-runner
  name: github-runner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: github-runner
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: github-runner
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GITHUB_OWNER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: GITHUB_OWNER
              name: github-secret
        - name: GITHUB_REPOSITORY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: GITHUB_REPOSITORY
              name: github-secret
        - name: GITHUB_PERSONAL_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: GITHUB_PERSONAL_TOKEN
              name: github-secret
        - name: DOCKER_HOST
          value: tcp://localhost:2375
        image: elmazidi/github-runner:latest
        name: github-runner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /work/
          name: data
      - env:
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: ""
        image: docker:24.0.6-dind
        name: dind
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 512Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker
          name: docker-graph-storage
        - mountPath: /work/
          name: data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: docker-graph-storage
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data

---

##### FILE: kubernetes28.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/kafka-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  log4j.properties: "# Set root logger level to INFO and its only appender to kafkaAppender.\nlog4j.rootLogger=INFO,
    kafkaAppender\n# kafkaAppender is set to be a ConsoleAppender.\nlog4j.appender.kafkaAppender=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender\n#
    kafkaAppender uses PatternLayout.\nlog4j.appender.kafkaAppender.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout\nlog4j.appender.kafkaAppender.layout.ConversionPattern=[%!d(MISSING)]
    %!p(MISSING) %!m(MISSING) (%!c(MISSING))%!n(MISSING)    \n"
  server.properties: |
    broker.id=0
    listeners=PLAINTEXT://:9092
    advertised.listeners=PLAINTEXT://kafka-service:9092
    dataDir=/bitnami/kafka/data
    log.dirs=/bitnami/kafka/logs
    auto.create.topics.enable=true
    zookeeper.connect=zk-headless:2181
    num.network.threads=3
    num.io.threads=8
    socket.send.buffer.bytes=102400
    socket.receive.buffer.bytes=102400
    socket.request.max.bytes=104857600
    num.partitions=1
    num.recovery.threads.per.data.dir=1
    offsets.topic.replication.factor=1
    transaction.state.log.replication.factor=1
    transaction.state.log.min.isr=1
    log.retention.hours=-1
    cluster.id=my-fixed-cluster-id
  zookeeper.properties: "# Zookeeper Server Configurations\ntickTime=2000\ndataDir=/bitnami/zookeeper/data\ndataLogDir=/bitnami/zookeeper/logs\nclientPort=2181\nallow.anonymous.login=yes\n#
    disable the per-ip limit on the number of connections since this is a non-production
    config\n#maxClientCnxns=0\n# Disable the adminserver by default to avoid port
    conflicts.\n# Set the port to something non-conflicting if choosing to enable
    this\n#admin.enableServer=false\n# admin.serverPort=8080\n# Add any additional
    Zookeeper configurations here    \ncluster.id=my-fixed-cluster-id\n"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: kafka-config
  namespace: default

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/rabbitmq-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  rabbitmq.conf: |-
    ## Clustering
    cluster_partition_handling = ignore

    ## Defaults
    default_permissions.configure = .*
    default_permissions.read = .*
    default_permissions.write = .*
    log.console = true
    default_vhost = /
    default_user = admin
    default_pass = admin

    ## Networking
    listeners.tcp.default = 5672

    #log.file.level = debug
    #log.dir = /bitnami/rabbitmq/log
    #log.file = rabbit.log

    #log.dir = /bitnami/rabbitmq/log

    ## Management
    #management.tcp.ip = 0.0.0.0
    #management.tcp.port = 15672
    loopback_users.guest = true

    ## Resource limits
    # Set a free disk space limit relative to total available RAM
    #disk_free_limit.relative = 0.5
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: rabbitmq-config
  namespace: default

---

##### FILE: kubernetes28_17.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/rabbitmq:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: rabbitmq
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: rabbitmq
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: rabbitmq
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: RABBITMQ_DEFAULT_USER
          value: admin
        - name: RABBITMQ_DEFAULT_PASS
          value: admin
        - name: RABBITMQ_HOME
          value: /bitnami/rabbitmq
        - name: RABBITMQ_MNESIA_BASE
          value: /bitnami/rabbitmq/mnesia
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: rabbitmq-config
        image: sasabistrovic/docker-data-rabbitmq:1.0
        name: rabbitmq
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5672
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/rabbitmq
          name: rabbitmq-data
        - mountPath: /bitnami/rabbitmq/log
          name: rabbitmq-logs
        - mountPath: /opt/bitnami/rabbitmq/etc/rabbitmq/rabbitmq.conf
          name: rabbitmq-config
          subPath: rabbitmq.conf
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chmod 777 /bitnami/rabbitmq
        image: busybox
        name: permissions-to-rabbitmq-data
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/rabbitmq
          name: rabbitmq-data
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - mkdir -p /bitnami/rabbitmq/log
        image: busybox
        name: create-log-dir
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/rabbitmq
          name: rabbitmq-data
      volumes:
      - name: rabbitmq-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: rabbitmq-data-pvc
      - name: rabbitmq-logs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: rabbitmq-logs-pvc
      - configMap:
          name: rabbitmq-config
        name: rabbitmq-config

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/elasticsearch:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: elasticsearch
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: discovery.type
          value: single-node
        - name: cluster.name
          value: elasticsearch
        - name: xpack.security.enabled
          value: "false"
        image: sasabistrovic/docker-data-elasticsearch:1.0
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions-data
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-data
      volumes:
      - name: elasticsearch-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: elasticsearch-pvc

---

##### FILE: kubernetes28_25.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/redis-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  redis.conf: |
    #bind 0.0.0.0
    port 6379
    tcp-backlog 511
    timeout 0
    tcp-keepalive 300
    supervised no
    #pidfile /opt/bitnami/redis/tmp/redis_6379.pid
    loglevel notice
    logfile /bitnami/redis/logs/redis.log
    databases 16
    always-show-logo yes
    #save 900 1
    #save 300 10
    #save 60 10000
    save 10 1
    stop-writes-on-bgsave-error yes
    rdbcompression yes
    rdbchecksum yes
    dbfilename dump.rdb
    rdb-del-sync-files no
    dir /bitnami/redis/data
    replica-serve-stale-data yes
    replica-read-only yes
    maxmemory 1GB
    repl-diskless-sync no
    repl-diskless-sync-delay 5
    repl-diskless-load disabled
    repl-disable-tcp-nodelay no
    replica-priority 100
    acllog-max-len 128
    lazyfree-lazy-eviction no
    lazyfree-lazy-expire no
    lazyfree-lazy-server-del no
    replica-lazy-flush no
    lazyfree-lazy-user-del no
    oom-score-adj no
    oom-score-adj-values 0 200 800
    appendonly no
    appendfilename "appendonly.aof"
    appendfsync everysec
    no-appendfsync-on-rewrite no
    auto-aof-rewrite-percentage 100
    auto-aof-rewrite-min-size 64mb
    aof-load-truncated yes
    aof-use-rdb-preamble yes
    lua-time-limit 5000
    notify-keyspace-events ""
    list-max-ziplist-size -2
    list-compress-depth 0
    set-max-intset-entries 512
    zset-max-ziplist-entries 128
    zset-max-ziplist-value 64
    hll-sparse-max-bytes 3000
    stream-node-max-bytes 4096
    stream-node-max-entries 100
    activerehashing yes
    client-output-buffer-limit normal 0 0 0
    client-output-buffer-limit replica 256mb 64mb 60
    client-output-buffer-limit pubsub 32mb 8mb 60
    hz 10
    dynamic-hz yes
    aof-rewrite-incremental-fsync yes
    rdb-save-incremental-fsync yes
    jemalloc-bg-thread yes
    protected-mode no
    replicaof no one
    requirepass my_password_example
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: redis-config
  namespace: default

---

##### FILE: kubernetes28_29.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/redis-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: redis-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: redis
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - redis-server
        - /opt/bitnami/redis/conf/redis.conf
        env:
        - name: ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD
          value: "yes"
        image: sasabistrovic/docker-data-redis:1.0
        name: redis
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/redis/data
          name: redis-data
        - mountPath: /bitnami/redis/logs
          name: redis-logs
        - mountPath: /opt/bitnami/redis/conf/redis.conf
          name: redis-config
          subPath: redis.conf
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - chmod
        - "777"
        - /bitnami/redis/data
        image: busybox
        name: permissions-fix-data
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/redis/data
          name: redis-data
      - command:
        - chmod
        - "777"
        - /bitnami/redis/logs
        image: busybox
        name: permissions-fix-log
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/redis/logs
          name: redis-logs
      volumes:
      - name: redis-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: redis-data
      - name: redis-logs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: redis-logs
      - configMap:
          name: redis-config
        name: redis-config

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/kafka-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: kafka-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kafka
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kafka
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - |
          /opt/bitnami/kafka/bin/zookeeper-server-stop.sh /opt/bitnami/kafka/config/zookeeper.properties && \
          /opt/bitnami/kafka/bin/kafka-server-stop.sh /opt/bitnami/kafka/config/server.properties && \
          /opt/bitnami/kafka/bin/zookeeper-server-start.sh /opt/bitnami/kafka/config/zookeeper.properties & \
          /opt/bitnami/kafka/bin/kafka-server-start.sh /opt/bitnami/kafka/config/server.properties
        env:
        - name: KAFKA_LISTENERS
          value: PLAINTEXT://:9092
        - name: KAFKA_ADVERTISED_LISTENERS
          value: PLAINTEXT://kafka-service:9092
        - name: KAFKA_LISTENER_SECURITY_PROTOCOL_MAP
          value: PLAINTEXT:PLAINTEXT,PLAINTEXT_HOST:PLAINTEXT
        - name: KAFKA_INTER_BROKER_LISTENER_NAME
          value: PLAINTEXT
        - name: KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT
          value: zk-headless:2181
        - name: KAFKA_AUTO_CREATE_TOPICS_ENABLE
          value: "true"
        - name: KAFKA_BROKER_ID
          value: "0"
        - name: KAFKA_NUM_NETWORK_THREADS
          value: "3"
        - name: KAFKA_NUM_IO_THREADS
          value: "8"
        - name: KAFKA_SOCKET_SEND_BUFFER_BYTES
          value: "102400"
        - name: KAFKA_SOCKET_RECEIVE_BUFFER_BYTES
          value: "102400"
        - name: KAFKA_SOCKET_REQUEST_MAX_BYTES
          value: "104857600"
        - name: KAFKA_NUM_PARTITIONS
          value: "1"
        - name: KAFKA_NUM_RECOVERY_THREADS_PER_DATA_DIR
          value: "1"
        - name: KAFKA_OFFSETS_TOPIC_REPLICATION_FACTOR
          value: "1"
        - name: KAFKA_TRANSACTION_STATE_LOG_REPLICATION_FACTOR
          value: "1"
        - name: KAFKA_TRANSACTION_STATE_LOG_MIN_ISR
          value: "1"
        - name: KAFKA_LOG_RETENTION_HOURS
          value: "168"
        - name: KAFKA_LOG_SEGMENT_BYTES
          value: "1073741824"
        - name: KAFKA_LOG_RETENTION_CHECK_INTERVAL_MS
          value: "300000"
        - name: KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_MS
          value: "18000"
        - name: KAFKA_GROUP_INITIAL_REBALANCE_DELAY_MS
          value: "0"
        - name: log4j.debug
          value: "true"
        - name: log4j.defaultInitOverride
          value: "true"
        - name: log4j.configuration
          value: file:///opt/bitnami/kafka/config/log4j.properties
        - name: log4j.ignoreTCL
          value: "true"
        image: sasabistrovic/docker-data-kafka:1.0
        name: kafka
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9092
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/bitnami/kafka/config
          name: kafka-config
          readOnly: false
        - mountPath: /bitnami/kafka/data
          name: kafka-data
        - mountPath: /bitnami/kafka/logs
          name: kafka-logs
        - mountPath: /bitnami/zookeeper/logs
          name: zookeeper-kafka-logs
        - mountPath: /bitnami/zookeeper/data
          name: zookeeper-kafka-data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1001:1001 /bitnami/kafka/logs
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions-kafka
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/kafka/logs
          name: kafka-logs
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1001:1001 /bitnami/zookeeper/logs
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions-zookeeper-log
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/zookeeper/logs
          name: zookeeper-kafka-logs
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1001:1001 /bitnami/zookeeper/data
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions-zookeeper-data
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/zookeeper/data
          name: zookeeper-kafka-data
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - rm -rf /bitnami/kafka/logs/lost+found
        image: busybox
        name: delete-lost-found
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/kafka/logs
          name: kafka-logs
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: kafka-config
        name: kafka-config
      - name: kafka-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: kafka-data
      - name: kafka-logs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: kafka-logs
      - name: zookeeper-kafka-logs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: zookeeper-kafka-logs
      - name: zookeeper-kafka-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: zookeeper-kafka-data

##### FILE: kubernetes28_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/zk-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: zk-statefulset
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: zookeeper
  serviceName: zk-headless
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: zookeeper
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - /apache-zookeeper-3.9.2-bin/bin/zkServer.sh start > zookeeper.log 2>&1 &
          tail -f /dev/null
        image: sasabistrovic/docker-data-zookeeper:1.0
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/sh
              - -c
              - /apache-zookeeper-3.9.2-bin/bin/zkServer.sh stop
        name: zookeeper
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2181
          name: client
        - containerPort: 2888
          name: peer
        - containerPort: 3888
          name: leader-election
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
        - mountPath: /conf
          name: conf
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: zookeeper-data
      - configMap:
          name: zookeeper-config
        name: conf

---

##### FILE: kubernetes29_19.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dynatrace/Deployment/dynatrace-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: operator
    app.kubernetes.io/name: dynatrace-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.6.0
  name: dynatrace-operator
  namespace: dynatrace
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: dynatrace-operator
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: operator
        app.kubernetes.io/name: dynatrace-operator
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.6.0
        name: dynatrace-operator
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - operator
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: docker.io/dynatrace/dynatrace-operator:v0.6.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /livez
            port: server-port
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: dynatrace-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: metrics
        - containerPort: 10080
          name: server-port
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /livez
            port: server-port
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - all
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/dynatrace-operator
          name: tmp-cert-dir
      serviceAccountName: dynatrace-operator
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-cert-dir

---

##### FILE: kubernetes29_20.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dynatrace/Deployment/dynatrace-webhook:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/name: dynatrace-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.6.0
  name: dynatrace-webhook
  namespace: dynatrace
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      internal.dynatrace.com/app: webhook
      internal.dynatrace.com/component: webhook
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: webhook
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/name: dynatrace-operator
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.6.0
        internal.dynatrace.com/app: webhook
        internal.dynatrace.com/component: webhook
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - webhook-server
        - --certs-dir=/tmp/k8s-webhook-server/serving-certs/
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: docker.io/dynatrace/dynatrace-operator:v0.6.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: webhook
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8383
          name: metrics
        - containerPort: 8384
          name: validation
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: server-port
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /livez
            port: server-port
            scheme: HTTPS
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - all
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/k8s-webhook-server/serving-certs/
          name: certs-dir
      serviceAccountName: dynatrace-webhook
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: certs-dir

---

kind: MutatingWebhookConfiguration

  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/name: dynatrace-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.6.0

- admissionReviewVersions:
  - v1beta1
  - v1
  clientConfig:
    service:
      name: dynatrace-webhook
      namespace: dynatrace
      path: /inject
  failurePolicy: Ignore
  name: webhook.pod.dynatrace.com
  namespaceSelector:
    matchExpressions:
    - key: dynakube.internal.dynatrace.com/instance
      operator: Exists
  reinvocationPolicy: IfNeeded
  rules:
  - apiGroups:
    - ""
    apiVersions:
    - v1
    operations:
    - CREATE
    resources:
    - pods
    scope: Namespaced
  sideEffects: None
  timeoutSeconds: 2

  - v1

      name: dynatrace-webhook
      namespace: dynatrace
      path: /label-ns

  name: webhook.ns.dynatrace.com

    - ""
    apiVersions:
    - v1
    operations:
    - CREATE
    - UPDATE
    resources:
    - namespaces
    scope: Cluster
  sideEffects: None

      port:
        number: 80
  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: counter-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/scrum-user-postgres:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: scrum-user-postgres
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: scrum-user-postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: scrum-user-postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_HOST_AUTH_METHOD
          value: trust
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: x
        image: sasabistrovic/scrum-user-postgres:1.0
        name: scrum-user-postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: scrum-user-data
        - mountPath: /etc/postgresql
          name: postgres-config
      volumes:
      - name: scrum-user-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: scrum-user-data
      - configMap:
          name: postgres-config
        name: postgres-config

        app: uc1
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: mongodb-config
        image: akarshj21/uc1:latest
        name: uc1-container

  labels:

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ValidatingWebhookConfiguration/namespace.webhook.example.com:
apiVersion: admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1
kind: ValidatingWebhookConfiguration
metadata:
  name: namespace.webhook.example.com
  namespace: default
webhooks:
- admissionReviewVersions:
  - v1
  clientConfig:
    caBundle: 
    service:
      name: validating-webhooks
      namespace: webhooks
      path: /webhook
      port: 443
  failurePolicy: Ignore
  name: namespace.webhook.create.com
  rules:
  - apiGroups:
    - ""
    apiVersions:
    - v1
    operations:
    - CREATE
    resources:
    - namespaces
  sideEffects: None
- admissionReviewVersions:
  - v1
  clientConfig:
    caBundle: 
    service:
      name: validating-webhooks
      namespace: webhooks
      path: /delete
      port: 443
  failurePolicy: Ignore
  name: namespace.webhook.delete.com
  rules:
  - apiGroups:
    - ""
    apiVersions:
    - v1
    operations:
    - DELETE
    resources:
    - namespaces
  sideEffects: None

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to webhooks/Deployment/validating-webhooks:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: validating-webhooks
  namespace: webhooks
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: validating-webhooks
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: validating-webhooks
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: namespace_update:v1
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: mutating-webhook
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/share/ca-certificates/
          name: webhook-certs
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: webhook-sa
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-certs
        secret:
          secretName: tls-secret

##### FILE: kubernetes40_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to web/Deployment/example-client:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: example-client
  name: example-client
  namespace: web
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 2
  revisionHistoryLimit: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: example-client
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: example-client
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - web
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SELF_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: SELF_POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: example-client
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: example-client
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 200Mi
      hostNetwork: false
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: web-sa
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 100

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to hydra-proxy/Deployment/hydra-proxy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: hydra-proxy
  name: hydra-proxy
  namespace: hydra-proxy
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 2
  revisionHistoryLimit: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hydra-proxy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hydra-proxy
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - hydra-proxy
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SELF_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: SELF_POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: hydra-proxy
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /_hydra/health
            port: 9988
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: hydra-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9988
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /_hydra/health
            port: 9988
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 300Mi
      hostNetwork: false
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: hydra-proxy-sa
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 100

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/drill:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: drill
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: drill
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: drill
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ZOOKEEPER_HOST
          value: zk-service

        name: drill

##### FILE: kubernetes5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/github-runner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: github-runner
  name: github-runner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: github-runner
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: github-runner
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GITHUB_OWNER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: GITHUB_OWNER
              name: github-secret
        - name: GITHUB_REPOSITORY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: GITHUB_REPOSITORY
              name: github-secret
        - name: GITHUB_PERSONAL_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: GITHUB_PERSONAL_TOKEN
              name: github-secret
        - name: DOCKER_HOST
          value: tcp://localhost:2375
        image: elmazidi/github-runner:latest
        name: github-runner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /work/
          name: data
      - env:
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: ""
        image: docker:24.0.6-dind
        name: dind
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 512Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker
          name: docker-graph-storage
        - mountPath: /work/
          name: data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: docker-graph-storage
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: admin
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: admin
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: orders
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_HOST
          value: '%!'(MISSING)
        - name: MYSQL_ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD
          value: "no"
        - name: MYSQL_AUTHENTICATION_PLUGIN
          value: mysql_native_password
        image: mysql:latest
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/github-runner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: github-runner
  name: github-runner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: github-runner
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: github-runner
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GITHUB_OWNER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: GITHUB_OWNER
              name: github-secret
        - name: GITHUB_REPOSITORY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: GITHUB_REPOSITORY
              name: github-secret
        - name: GITHUB_PERSONAL_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: GITHUB_PERSONAL_TOKEN
              name: github-secret
        - name: DOCKER_HOST
          value: tcp://localhost:2375
        image: github-runner:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: github-runner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /work/
          name: data
      - env:
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: ""
        image: docker:24.0.6-dind
        name: dind
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 512Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker
          name: docker-graph-storage
        - mountPath: /work/
          name: data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: docker-graph-storage
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data

##### FILE: kubernetes9.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/counter-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: counter-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: counter
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: counter
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: counter:v0.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: counter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 4
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 4
            memory: 50Mi

---

##### FILE: kubernetes-manifests_15.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/loadgenerator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: loadgenerator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: loadgenerator
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/rewriteAppHTTPProbers: "true"
      labels:
        app: loadgenerator
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: FRONTEND_ADDR
          value: frontend:80
        - name: USERS
          value: "10"
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/microservices-demo/loadgenerator:v0.8.1
        name: main
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -exc
        - |
          echo "Init container pinging frontend: ${FRONTEND_ADDR}..."
          STATUSCODE=$(wget --server-response http://${FRONTEND_ADDR} 2>&1 | awk '/^  HTTP/{print $2}')
          if test $STATUSCODE -ne 200; then
              echo "Error: Could not reach frontend - Status code: ${STATUSCODE}"
              exit 1
          fi
        env:
        - name: FRONTEND_ADDR
          value: frontend:80
        image: busybox:latest
        name: frontend-check
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      restartPolicy: Always
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 5

---

      app: shippingservice
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: shippingservice
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "50051"
        - name: DISABLE_PROFILER
          value: "1"
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/microservices-demo/shippingservice:v0.8.1
        livenessProbe:
          grpc:
            port: 50051
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 50051
        readinessProbe:
          grpc:
            port: 50051
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default

##### FILE: kubernetes-manifests_20.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/redis-cart:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: redis-cart
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis-cart
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: redis-cart
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: redis:alpine
        livenessProbe:
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 6379
        name: redis
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        readinessProbe:
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 6379
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 125m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 70m
            memory: 200Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: redis-data
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: redis-data

---

##### FILE: kubernetes-manifests_6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/rewriteAppHTTPProbers: "true"
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: PRODUCT_CATALOG_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: productcatalogservice:3550
        - name: CURRENCY_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: currencyservice:7000
        - name: CART_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: cartservice:7070
        - name: RECOMMENDATION_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: recommendationservice:8080
        - name: SHIPPING_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: shippingservice:50051
        - name: CHECKOUT_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: checkoutservice:5050
        - name: AD_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: adservice:9555
        - name: ENABLE_PROFILER
          value: "0"
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/microservices-demo/frontend:v0.8.1
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-liveness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-readiness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default

---

          periodSeconds: 15

        - containerPort: 9555

##### FILE: kubernetes-manifests11_6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/rewriteAppHTTPProbers: "true"
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: PRODUCT_CATALOG_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: productcatalogservice:3550
        - name: CURRENCY_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: currencyservice:7000
        - name: CART_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: cartservice:7070
        - name: RECOMMENDATION_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: recommendationservice:8080
        - name: SHIPPING_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: shippingservice:50051
        - name: CHECKOUT_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: checkoutservice:5050
        - name: AD_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: adservice:9555
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/microservices-demo/frontend:v0.2.3
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-liveness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-readiness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
      serviceAccountName: default

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/emailservice:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: emailservice
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: emailservice
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: emailservice
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: DISABLE_PROFILER
          value: "1"
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/microservices-demo/emailservice:v0.9.0
        livenessProbe:
          grpc:
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          grpc:
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 5

##### FILE: kubernetes-manifests12_15.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/loadgenerator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: loadgenerator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: loadgenerator
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/rewriteAppHTTPProbers: "true"
      labels:
        app: loadgenerator
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: FRONTEND_ADDR
          value: frontend:80
        - name: USERS
          value: "10"
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/microservices-demo/loadgenerator:v0.9.0
        name: main
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -exc
        - |
          echo "Init container pinging frontend: ${FRONTEND_ADDR}..."
          STATUSCODE=$(wget --server-response http://${FRONTEND_ADDR} 2>&1 | awk '/^  HTTP/{print $2}')
          if test $STATUSCODE -ne 200; then
              echo "Error: Could not reach frontend - Status code: ${STATUSCODE}"
              exit 1
          fi
        env:
        - name: FRONTEND_ADDR
          value: frontend:80
        image: busybox:latest
        name: frontend-check
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      restartPolicy: Always
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 5

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/loadgenerator

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: currencyservice
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currencyservice
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: currencyservice
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "7000"
        - name: DISABLE_PROFILER
          value: "1"
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/microservices-demo/currencyservice:v0.9.0
        livenessProbe:
          grpc:
            port: 7000
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7000
          name: grpc
        readinessProbe:
          grpc:
            port: 7000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 5

##### FILE: kubernetes-manifests12_20.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/redis-cart:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: redis-cart
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis-cart
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: redis-cart
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: redis:alpine
        livenessProbe:
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 6379
        name: redis
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        readinessProbe:
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 6379
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 125m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 70m
            memory: 200Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: redis-data
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: redis-data

---

##### FILE: kubernetes-manifests12_6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/rewriteAppHTTPProbers: "true"
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: PRODUCT_CATALOG_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: productcatalogservice:3550
        - name: CURRENCY_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: currencyservice:7000
        - name: CART_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: cartservice:7070
        - name: RECOMMENDATION_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: recommendationservice:8080
        - name: SHIPPING_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: shippingservice:50051
        - name: CHECKOUT_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: checkoutservice:5050
        - name: AD_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: adservice:9555
        - name: ENABLE_PROFILER
          value: "0"
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/microservices-demo/frontend:v0.9.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-liveness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-readiness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default

---

##### FILE: kubernetes-manifests13_15.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/loadgenerator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: loadgenerator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: loadgenerator
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/rewriteAppHTTPProbers: "true"
      labels:
        app: loadgenerator
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: FRONTEND_ADDR
          value: frontend:80
        - name: USERS
          value: "10"
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/microservices-demo/loadgenerator:v0.9.0
        name: main
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -exc
        - |
          echo "Init container pinging frontend: ${FRONTEND_ADDR}..."
          STATUSCODE=$(wget --server-response http://${FRONTEND_ADDR} 2>&1 | awk '/^  HTTP/{print $2}')
          if test $STATUSCODE -ne 200; then
              echo "Error: Could not reach frontend - Status code: ${STATUSCODE}"
              exit 1
          fi
        env:
        - name: FRONTEND_ADDR
          value: frontend:80
        image: busybox:latest
        name: frontend-check
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      restartPolicy: Always
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 5

---

##### FILE: kubernetes-manifests13_20.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/redis-cart:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: redis-cart
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis-cart
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: redis-cart
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: redis:alpine
        livenessProbe:
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 6379
        name: redis
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        readinessProbe:
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 6379
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 125m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 70m
            memory: 200Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: redis-data
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: redis-data

---

kind: Deployment

  namespace: default

    matchLabels:
      app: adservice
  template:

      labels:
        app: adservice
    spec:
      containers:

        - name: PORT
          value: "9555"

        livenessProbe:
          grpc:
            port: 9555
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 15
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9555
        readinessProbe:
          grpc:
            port: 9555
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 15

          limits:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 300Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 180Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 5

##### FILE: kubernetes-manifests13_6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/rewriteAppHTTPProbers: "true"
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: PRODUCT_CATALOG_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: productcatalogservice:3550
        - name: CURRENCY_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: currencyservice:7000
        - name: CART_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: cartservice:7070
        - name: RECOMMENDATION_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: recommendationservice:8080
        - name: SHIPPING_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: shippingservice:50051
        - name: CHECKOUT_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: checkoutservice:5050
        - name: AD_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: adservice:9555
        - name: ENABLE_PROFILER
          value: "0"
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/microservices-demo/frontend:v0.9.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-liveness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-readiness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default

---

  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: loadgenerator
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/rewriteAppHTTPProbers: "true"
      labels:
        app: loadgenerator

      - env:
        - name: FRONTEND_ADDR
          value: frontend:80

          value: "10"

        name: main
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 256Mi
      restartPolicy: Always

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/currencyservice:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: currencyservice
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currencyservice
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: currencyservice
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "7000"
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/microservices-demo/currencyservice:v0.2.3
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/grpc_health_probe
            - -addr=:7000
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7000
          name: grpc
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/grpc_health_probe
            - -addr=:7000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
      serviceAccountName: default
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 5

##### FILE: kubernetes-manifests14_20.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/redis-cart:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: redis-cart
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis-cart
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: redis-cart
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: redis:alpine
        livenessProbe:
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 6379
        name: redis
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        readinessProbe:
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 6379
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 125m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 70m
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: redis-data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: redis-data

---

  namespace: default

    matchLabels:
      app: adservice
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: adservice
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "9555"

            command:
            - /bin/grpc_health_probe
            - -addr=:9555
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 15
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9555
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/grpc_health_probe
            - -addr=:9555
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 15
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 300Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 180Mi

      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 5

##### FILE: kubernetes-manifests14_6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/rewriteAppHTTPProbers: "true"
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: PRODUCT_CATALOG_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: productcatalogservice:3550
        - name: CURRENCY_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: currencyservice:7000
        - name: CART_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: cartservice:7070
        - name: RECOMMENDATION_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: recommendationservice:8080
        - name: SHIPPING_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: shippingservice:50051
        - name: CHECKOUT_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: checkoutservice:5050
        - name: AD_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: adservice:9555
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/microservices-demo/frontend:v0.2.3
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-liveness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-readiness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
      serviceAccountName: default

---
